mapper.select: SELECT REPORT_ID,ORG_CODE,QUERY_REASON, REPORT_TIME, SUM_ENT_IDENT,RATE_EXCHANGE,EFFE_DATE_RATE, ENT_NAME ,OBJ_LAB_ITEM FROM COM_REPORT_INFO WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}
SELECT TYPE_ENT_IDENT, NUM_ENT_INDENT FROM COM_IDENT_BASIC WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}
SELECT SUB_INDUSTRY,TYPE_ORGAN,SCALE_ENT, ADDRESS_EDI, YEAR_SETUP,STATE_CX, ADDRE_BUSS, LICENSE_DATE,TYPE_ECONOMIC FROM COM_CREDIT_BASIC_INFO WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}
SELECT TYPE_INVEST,TYPE_INVEST_IDENT, INVE_NAME, INVE_CRED_TYPE, INVE_CRED_NUM, INVE_PERCENT FROM COM_INVESTOR_INFO WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}
SELECT NUM_PEPL,DATE_UPDATE_SENIOR FROM COM_MAIN_MEMBER WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}
SELECT SENIOR_DUTIES, SENIOR_NAME, SNEIOR_CRED_TYPE , SNEIOR_CRED_NUM FROM COM_SENIOR_MANAGER_INFO WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}
SELECT CONTROL_NUM,DATE_UPDATE_ACT FROM COM_CONTRO_PERSON WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}
SELECT NAME_IDENTITY,TYPE_IDENTITY_LOGO, TYPE_IDENTITY, TYPE_IDENTITY_NUM FROM COM_ACTUAL_CONTROLLER WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}

SELECT CURRENT_DEBT,OVER_DEBT,UNCLEAR_ORG, SECURED_TRANS_BALANCE,FOCUS_SEC_TRANS_BA,RELATION_ORG, FIRST_REPAY_LIAB_YEAR,RECOVER_CURRENT_DEBT,FOCUS_CURRENT_DEBT,SECURED_OVER_DEBT, FIRST_TRADE_YEAR,NUM_NO_CRET_TRA_ACC,TAX_ARRENS_NUM,NUM_JUDG_RECORD,NUM_ENFORCE_RECORD,NUM_ADMINI_PUNI FROM COM_INFO_CREDIT WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}

SELECT LAST_ADS_ACC_DATE,YDATE_SETTLEMENT,ASSETS_DISP_BALANCE, NUM_ADVANCES_ACCOUNT,OVER_INTERST_OTHER,YDATE_COMPLETION, ASSETS_DISP_NUM,ADVAES_ACC_BALANCE,YADVANCES_ACCOUNT_BALANCE, YASSETS_DISP_NUM,NUM_MONTH_FZ,LAST_DISP_DATE,OVER_SUM, OVER_PRINCIPAL,YNUM_ADVANCES_ACCOUNT,NUM_OTHER_TRANS, YASSETS_DISP_BALANCE,YNUM_OTHER_TRANS_YJ FROM COM_LEND_TRANS WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}
SELECT NUM_SECURED_TRANS_CAT,NUM_SECURED_NOTRANS FROM COM_GUAR_TRANS_IN WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}
SELECT ASSET_QUALITY_CLA,BUSS_TYPE,NUM_ACCOUNT FROM COM_GUAR_TRANS_INFO_SET WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}
SELECT NUM_REPAY_LIA,NUM_REPAY_LIA_DB FROM COM_REPAY_REP_NUM WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}

SELECT BALANCE_NUM_OTHER_FOCUS,NUM_AMONUT_ACCOUNT,BALANCE_NUM_RECOVER,AMOUNT_REPAY_RECOVER_OTHERS, NUM_OTHER_TRANS_BORROW,BALANCE_NUM_OTHER_TRANS_BORROW,TYPE_RESPON,AMOUNT_REPAY_RECOVER, BALANCE_NUM_OTHER_BAD FROM COM_BORROM_REPAY WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}
SELECT AMOUNT_REPAY_RECOVER,BALANCE_NUM_FOCUS,NUM_ACCOUNT,BALANCE_NUM, TYPE_RESPON,BALANCE_NUM_FOCUS_BAD FROM COM_GUAR_TRANS_RESPON_INFO WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}

SELECT IN_NINETY_DAY_BAL_NUM,ADVANCES,FIVE_CLA,NUM_ACC_SETTLE,BALANCE_NUM, IN_THIRTY_DAY_BAL_NUM,GUAR_TRANS_SPECIES_NICHE, NUM_OUTSTAND_ACCOUNT,IN_SIXTY_DAY_BAL_NUM,TYPE_ORG,CODE_ORG, GUAR_ACCOUT_ID,AFTER_NINETY_DAY_BAL_NUM FROM COM_GUARANTEE_DET WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}

SELECT CRED_ID,QUOTA_CYC_MARK,TYPE_CERD,CR_LIM_ID,CODE_ORG, END_DATE,DATE_INFO_REPORT,EFFEC_DATE,TYPE_ORG,CURRENCY, CR_CREDIT_SUM,CR_USED_SUM,CR_LIM FROM COM_CREDIT_INFO_DATA WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}
SELECT SMART_BUS,TYPE_ORG,CODE_ORG,NUM_GUAR_CONTRA, GUAR_ACCOUT_ID,FIVE_CLA,NUM_ACCOUNT,REPAY_RESP_TYPE, BALANCE_NUM,REPAY_RESP_BALA,GUAR_SUM FROM COM_REPAY_GUAR WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}
SELECT RECONSIDERATION_RESULT,PENALTIES_COMAPNY, PENALTIES_ID,SERIAL,PENALTIES_SUM,START_DATE,PENALTIES_SITATION, ILEHAL_BEHAVIOR,PENALTIES_DECIDION FROM COM_PENALTIES WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}

SELECT FIRST_PAY_DATE,EMPLOY_NUM,PAY_TO_DATE, PAY_STATUS,TOTAL_ARREAR_SUM,DATE_PAY_RECENT,PAY_RECOD_NUM_PROVID, STATIC_DATE,NUM_PEP,SER_NO,SERIAL FROM COM_PROVID_FUND_PAY_RECORD WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}
SELECT LAST_PAY_DATE,STATIC_DATE,CUR_SHOULD_PAY, TOTAL_ARREAR_SUM,SERIAL,CUR_ACTUAL_PAY FROM COM_PROVID_PAY_RECORD_YEAR WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}

SELECT FINA_ID,INVENTORY,SHOULD_PAPER,SPE_SHOULD_PAR,ESTIMA_DEBT,FLOW_LIA_SUM_UN,CAPITAL_RESERVES, SURPLUS_RESERVES,TOTAL_OWNER_EQUITY,MONEY_FUND,PRE_PAR,OTHER_SHOULD_PAR,END_DATE_INVEST, UNFLOW_ASSET,DEFE_REVEN,OTH_FLOW_LIA,OTHER_SHOULD_FU_PA,BORR_LONGTIM,NUM_FINA,NUM_ORG,REPORT_TYPE, INVEST_BUILD,FIX_ASSET_CLEAN,OIL_GAS_ASSET,UN_ASSET,SHOULD_PROFIT,SHOULD_DIVI,SHOULD_DEBT,PAY_LONGTIM, TRANS_ASSET_FIX,ASSET_MARK_FINA,REDUCE_ASSET,SHORT_TIME_BORR,REPORT_YEAR,SHOULD_PAPER_IN, SHOULD_INTERST,PAY_DEP,LONG_TERM_AMOR,TRANS_INFO_DEBT,SHOULD_PAY_TAX,YEARS_UNFLOWS_DEBT,FLOW_LIA_SUM, INCRES_DY,OTHERS_UNFLOWS_DEBT,SUM_DEBT,REDUCE_DIV,SHOULD_ACCOUNT,ENGIN_MATER,SHOULD_PAR,TOTAL_DEBT_OWNER_SUM, SMART_TYPE_REPORT,SHOULD_DIVI_IN,UNFLOW_ASSET_END,OTHER_FLOW_ASSET,FLOW_ASSET_SUM,LONG_TERM_EQUI_INVE, LONG_TERM_RECE,GOODWILL,OTHER_UNFLOW_ASSET,SUM_ASSET,RECEIVE_MONEY,UNDIS_PROFIT,FIX_ASSET,ENGINEERING, ASSET_PRODUC_BIOLO,SHOULD_WAGE FROM COM_FINANCIAL_SEVEN_INFO WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}

SELECT EXTRA_SUR_RES,EXTRA_EMPLY_WEFARE,REPORT_TYPE,INCOME_DG,OTHER_ADJUST_REASON, SINGLE_RETEN_PROF,INCOME_BUS,BUSS_OTHER_PROFITS,OTHERS_COST,INCOME_SUBSIDIES, PROFITS_LOSS_MIN,NET_PROFIT,PROFITS_INVEST_FP,EXP_PRD_COST,DEFE_INCOME,INCOME_COMPANY_KS, INCOME_SALE_ASSET,OTHERS_PROFITS,OTHER_PAY,TAX,DIVI_PAY_PREFER,PAY_DIV_ASSET, UNDIS_PROFIT,LOSS_TAX_BEFOR,EXP_INCOME_PRD,IN_INCOME_PRD,BUS_TAX_OTHER,FINA_COST, WAGE_CARRY_FORWARD,SUM_PROFITS,PAY_DIVI_PT,FINA_ID,NUM_FINA,NUM_ORG,SMART_TYPE_REPORT, DISCOUNT,OPERATING_EXPENSE,OPERATING_EXPEN,MANA_COST,FINE_INCOME,FINE_COST,EXTRA_SUR_MONEY, OTHER_INVEST_PROFITS,COST_BUSS,INCOME_INVEST,INCOME_FUTURE,INCOME_BUSS_YYW,INCOME_ASSET_SHYI, BUSS_PAY,DONATE_COST,SUR_RES_LOSS,SUPP_FLOWS_ASSET,EXTRA_RESERVE,REPORT_YEAR,OTHERS, BUSS_PROFITS_Z,BUSS_PROFITS,LOSS_FIX_ASSET,UNCOMFI_INVES_LOSS,STAR_YEAR_UNDOPROFIT, ASSIGEN_PROFIT,PROFIT_INVEST,EXTRA_YYGJ,NET_BUSS,INCOME_OTHER,NON_MONEY_BENEFITS,PROFITS_BEFOR, LOSS_DEBT,EXTRA_DEVELOP_FUND,OTHERS_KFP FROM COM_PROFIT_INFO_TWO_INFO WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}

SELECT BUSS_SHOULD_INCRES,YEAR_COMPANY_DEBT,CASH_END_BA,SMART_TYPE_REPORT, INVE_OTHER_ACTI_CASH,CASH_INVE_ABSOR,FIXED_FUND_OLD,SUM_BUSS_CASH_IN, SUM_BUSS_CASH_OUT,LONG_TERM_INVEST,SUM_INVE_CASH_IN,REPAY_PAY_CASH,IMPACT_EXCHANGE_RATE, NET_PROFIT,INCREAS_WITHHOLDING,FINA_CHAR,OTHERS_NO,CASH_STAR_BA,RECE_INVEST_CASH, SMART_SUM_CA_INVEST,RAISE_ACTI_LINE,SEME_CASH_BAL,AMORTIZATION_REDUCE,REDUCE_INVENT, BUSS_SHOULD_REDUCE,CASH_BALA_END,RECE_OTHER_AC_CASH,BUY_CASH,PAY_SOME_TAX,PAY_OTHERS_CASH_BU, INVEST_RECE_CASH,RECEIVE_OTHER_CASH,RECE_OTHER_AC_CASH_I,ASSET_REDUCE,LONG_TERM_AMOR, BUS_ACTI_CASH_FO,CASH_BALA_STAR,FINA_ID,CASH_LONG_TERM,BORR_RECE_CASH,DEFE_TAX_CREDIT, OTHERS,REPORT_YEAR,CASH_GOOD,TAX_RECEIVE,PAY_OTHERS_CASH_BUSS,FIX_LOSS,DEBT_CAPITAL, NUM_ORG,REPORT_TYPE,PAY_EMPLOY_CASH,BUS_ACTI_CASH_FOLW,INVEST_CASH_NET,SMART_SUM_ACTI, RAISE_ACTI_FLOW,ASSET_FIX_CAP,SEME_CASH_BAL_IN,NUM_FINA,INVEST_PAY_CASH,PAY_CASH, AMORTIZATION,ASSET_LOSS,INVEST_LOSS FROM COM_CASH_FLOW_TWO_INFO WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}

SELECT NUM_ORG,SUM_BUSS_CASH_IN,PAY_SOME_TAX,RECE_INST_CASH_OTHER, TAKE_BORRO_RECE_CASH,INCREAS_WITHHOLDING,BUS_ACTIV_CASH,ASSET_FIX_CAP, PAY_EMPLOY_CASH,PAY_BUSS_OTHER_CASH,SUM_BUSS_CASH_OUT,INVEST_PAY_CASH, CASH_INVE_ABSOR,END_SEME_CASH_BAL,ASSET_LOSS,YEAR_COMPANY_DEBT,CASH_END_BA, FINA_ID,TAX_RECEIVE,LONG_TERM_INVEST,INVEST_CASH_NET,SMART_SUM_ACTI, START_SEME_CASH_BAL,AMORTIZATION,LONG_TERM_AMOR,FINA_CHAR,INCRES_TAX, INVEST_RECE_CASH,REPAY_PAY_CASH,PAY_CASH,RAISE_ACTI_FLOW,RAISE_ACTI_LINE, AMORTIZATION_REDUCE,FIX_LOSS,INCREAS_IN,NUM_FINA,CASH,SUM_INVE_CASH_IN, REPORT_YEAR,REPORT_TYPE,RECE_INVEST_CASH,PAY_OTHER_CASH,BUSS_SHOULD_INCRES, CASH_BALA_END,CASH_STAR_BA,TAX_RECEIVE_OTHERS,BUS_ACTI_CASH_FOLW, CASH_BUS_COMPANY,CASH_LONG_TERM,SMART_SUM_CA_INVEST,RECE_OTHER_AC_CASH, PAY_OTHERS_CASH,IMPACT_EXCHANGE_RATE,SEME_CASH_BAL,NET_PROFIT,INVEST_LOSS, REDUCE_TAX,BUSS_SHOULD_REDUCE,DEBT_CAPITAL,CASH_BALA_STAR,OTHERS_NO, SMART_TYPE_REPORT,BUY_CASH,RECE_COMP_BUS_CASH,ASSET_PREPARE,DEPRECIATION, PUBLIC_LOSS,REDUCE_INVENT,OTHERS FROM COM_CASH_FLOW_SEVEN_INFO WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}

SELECT REPORT_YEAR,IN_AFF_PAY,INCOME_NOTBUDG_OUT,INCOME_BUS,INCOME_SUM, SET_ASIDE_FUNDS,TAX_SALE,BALAN_DIS,SMA_SUM_CAR,BEFOR_YEAR_BUSLOSS, BALA_OTHER_DIS,IN_FIS_SUB_IN,PAY_CAR_FIS,CARR_FOR_SEL_INFRAS,PAY_CAR_SUM, DIA_OUT_SPEFUN,CAR_BALANCE,OUT_DRA_FUN,FINA_ID,SMART_TYPE_REPORT,TOP_IN_FIS, IN_FIS_SUB,TAX_SALE_IN,NUM_FINA,PAY_BUS,SHOULD_PAY_TAX,NUM_ORG, IN_CAR,INCOME_OTHERS,SMA_DIAINTO_SPEFUN,PAY_NOBUDG_OUT,PAY_SPEFUN, NORMAL_BALANCE,BUSS_SUM,WITH_DRA_FUN,REPORT_TYPE,OUT_CAR,SUM_SPEFUN, PAY_LAST_YEAR_CAR,SMA_INCOME_BUS,DIA_INTO_SPEFUND,PAY_OUT_TOP, BUS_SMAR_SUM,PAY_SUM FROM COM_CAR_ASS_OUT_NS_INFO WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}
SELECT RAT_ID,RAT_NAME,RAT_RES,RAT_DATE FROM COM_RAT_INFO WHERE REPORT_ID = #{_parameter}
